meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to a mode or modality.
meanings.sent1: The nonmodal approach to problem-solving considers various options.
meanings.sent2: Her nonmodal thinking led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The nonmodal way he tied his shoelaces left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmodal creativity was a breath of fresh air in the office.
meanings.sent5: The nonmodal design of the building stood out among the traditional structures.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to the usual or typical pattern or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His nonmodal fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonmodal paintings challenged viewers' perceptions.
meanings.sent3: The nonmodal behavior of the cat chasing its tail amused the children.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmodal approach to cooking resulted in surprisingly delicious dishes.
meanings.sent5: The nonmodal weather patterns this year have been unpredictable.
